data.name: Twist.moe Blue
data.description: Changes certain features of the site that were red to blue (text, bars, etc)

data.name: Codeforces New Design
BetterYT (for YouTube Mobile site)
data.description:
Tweaks to make the YT mobile site a bit better. Features include:

- Dark mode (follows system settings)
- More padding on video browsing pages (if your screen is wide enough)
- Subtle hover effects on some buttons.

data.name: iCloud Notes Darkmode
data.description: A soothing dark mode with blue accents and configuration options

data.name: RARBG Dark Surface
data.description: This is a Dark Style for RARBG. Important: If you're having issues updating this style first uninstall it, then reload the page and install it again after selecting your settings. I highly recommend using Stylus over Stylish for both Firefox and Chrome and other supported browsers, mainly because that is what i use for my browsers when i create these styles. Here's a link to the add-on: Stylus for Firefox Stylus for Chrome If you have any issues, questions or feedback, you can contact me here Adam-J-Frost@outlook.com. If you would like to help me out, you can donate to me here: Donate via Ko-fi. I hope you like this style and thank you for using it!

user.name: AdamJFrost
user.about: I like making styles for sites i use. I try to keep them up-to-date as much as i can. If you would like to donate and help me out you can use this link to Donate via Ko-fi. Thanks for using my styles and Thanks if you Donated!

data.description: The attempt to create a robust dark-themed userstyle for Socialblade.com. UserStyle with on-the-fly configuration and automated updates available at my GitHub.

data.description: Hide the clarify box which contains informations about Coronavirus for example.

data.name: Flickr in Dark Mode
data.description:
v1.0.2
Flickr in dark mode. Tired of the brightness of Flickr pages? Install this to browse Flickr without applying sunscreen first.
